name: markdown-table
description: Convert JSON data to formatted Markdown tables. Perfect for presenting structured data in Discord, Slack, or any Markdown-supporting chat.
author: spark

endpoints.description: Generate a Markdown table from JSON array or object

parameters.data: Array of objects OR object with array values
parameters.columns: (optional) Array of column names to include, in order
parameters.headers: (optional) Object mapping column keys to display headers
parameters.maxWidth: (optional) Max characters per cell before truncating

examples.output:
| name | role | active |
|------|------|--------|
| Alice | Admin | true |
| Bob | User | false |
